title: Evaluate Supplier Performance
description: A procurement manager needs to conduct a quarterly performance review of a key supplier.

tasks.description: Gather all data for the supplier for the last quarter, including on-time delivery rate, order accuracy, and quality inspection results.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a complete dataset of the supplier's performance.

tasks.description: Analyze the data and score the supplier against key performance indicators (KPIs).
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows the supplier has an excellent on-time delivery rate but a slightly high defect rate.

tasks.description: Generate a supplier scorecard and schedule a meeting with the supplier to discuss the results.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces the scorecard and sets up a review meeting.
